attributes.action: Consider the Way the EFL curtailed the 2019-2020 season
attributes.additional_details: By monitoring the EFL so Football Clubs will not be allowed to go into liquidation , and receive all the support from the Sports Minister and the Goverment , So football Fans will be able to attend matches and the Leagues don't fold in the future and a fairer share of monies from the Premier League right down to grassroots level.
attributes.background: We are afraid with the corona virus ,and the way the EFL handled the curtailment of this Football season 2019-2020 Some football clubs could go into liquidation ,and request this isn't, allowed to happen .And monitor the EFl in the future with transparency at all times.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the operation of EFL.  This is a matter for the EFL and its members.
